attributes.action: force local police to respond to the needs and concerns of local commuities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The public are continually ignored by local police forces who seem to be more concerned with PR than with dealing with public concerns about yobs, anti-social behaviour and speeding. Police MUST be made accountable to the communities that pay for them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
